text: Tumha sarvanna allahacyaca javala jayace ahe. Allahane sacca vayada kelela ahe. Nihsansaya toca pahilyanda nirmana karato, maga toca dusaryanda nirmana karila, yasathi ki asa lokanna, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarme kelita, tyanna n'yayapurvaka mobadala dyava ani jyanni inkara kela, tyanna pinyasathi ukalate pani milela ani duhkhadayaka siksa-yatana labhela tyancya inkara karanyapayi
